about_the_game:
Welcome to Duel Legends, a revolutionary auto-battler card game where strategic depth meets dynamic combat. Step into a world where every card played transforms your hero into an unstoppable force on the battlefield.

In Duel Legends, every decision matters. Players will engage in strategic deck-building, choosing cards that not only strengthen their hero but also create powerful synergies. The game features dynamic auto-battle sequences where heroes autonomously fight using the configured powers, leading to thrilling and unpredictable battles. The objective is to outmaneuver your opponents by strategically combining cards and exploiting synergies to their fullest potential.

Begin your journey by choosing a hero. Amplify your hero's power through strategic card acquisition, which boosts their inherent abilities fitting into various synergies such as:

  • Healing

  • Attack

  • Evasion

  • Poison

  • Shields

  • Rage

  • Frost

  • Arcane

  • Crit

  • Vulnerability

  • Stamina

  • Summoning

These synergies are critical in defining your tactical approach and gameplay strategy.

Experience the core of Duel Legends in our auto-battle sequences where heroes fight using their configured powers autonomously.

Each battle unfolds in thrilling ways, keeping you on the edge of your seat as you watch your strategies come to life.

Card Acquisition and Deck Building: Collect cards, build and refine your deck to strengthen your hero and create powerful synergies.

Combat with Neutral Mobs: Encounter and fight neutral creatures like wolves and spiders, each offering unique challenges and rewards.

Items and Artifacts: Choose items that enhance your hero’s abilities, tailoring your approach to combat and synergy.

Economic Strategy: Manage resources wisely, deciding when to invest in new cards or save for future rounds.

Challenge other players in intense PvP battles, test your strategies, and climb the ranks. Engage in a community of fellow strategists, share tactics, and compete for supremacy.

Maximize your heroes' potential by mastering the art of synergy. The right combination of cards can trigger devastating effects, transforming straightforward encounters into showcases of tactical prowess.

Dive into a competitive world where each decision shapes your journey to the top. With regular updates introducing new cards and challenges, Duel Legends is an ever-evolving battlefield that keeps the game fresh and engaging.

Ready to claim your legend? Duel Legends awaits.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11 and later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Big Sur 11 and later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Duel Legends

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core i3 processor / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 720 / Radeon R7 240 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Should run smoothly at 30 FPS on old computers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 3 GHz Intel Core i3 processor / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 / Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Duel Legends - a revolutionary auto-battler card game where strategy meets dynamic combat. Step into a world where every card you play transforms your hero into an unstoppable force.
